UX Design | UI Design | Front-End Development

As a designer and developer with seven plus years of experience, I push to design intuitive user experiences, while finding elegant solutions to new challenges as they arise. I am currently working to help consumers make better healthcare choices for health transparency startup Healthsparq. Where my role as User Experience Designer empowers me to help craft modern solutions and tools for an industry still anchored in the past.
